t, easily digestible, low-fat food during labour. Th  is is because labour requires 
large amounts of energy. In the case of women who have not eaten for some time 
or who are undernourished, the eff  ects of labour can quickly lead to physiological 
exhaustion, dehydration and ketosis (maternal acidosis), which can result in 
foetal distress. Th erefore, encourage the woman to eat and drink as she wishes 
throughout labour.
